profile.name: Veeranarayana Gorantla
profile.title: Cybersecurity Specialist | Penetration Tester | Cloud Enthusiast
profile.bio: Motivated Computer Science student with a strong foundation in Cybersecurity, Cloud Computing, and Web Development. Skilled in endpoint security, network defense, and cloud infrastructure (GCP/Oracle). Passionate about securing digital assets and innovating in the cloud security space.

projects.title: FedEx Flex-Pay AI
projects.description: An AI-driven solution for FedEx to handle late payments and transaction reminders dynamically.

projects.title: Vulnerability Scanner
projects.description: Developed a Python-based vulnerability scanner for websites with an HTML interface to identify potential security weaknesses.

projects.title: Blood Bank System
projects.description: A management system addressing remote location emergency issues and facilitating easier access to blood banks.

projects.title: Hackathon Project
projects.description: Collaborative project developed during a hackathon, focusing on rapid prototyping and teamwork.

experience.description: Building personal projects, developing new skills, and exploring advanced cybersecurity concepts. Focusing on continuous learning and hands-on experimentation.
Completed practical task modules in cybersecurity operations, analyzing malware and ensuring compliance with security standards.
